lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia had a grand slam and a solo homer, David Ortiz passed two Hall of Fame Red Sox on the extra-base hits list and Boston beat Atlanta 9-4 on Wednesday night even as the Braves ended their 15-game homerless stretch.

headline.print_headline: Pedroia Hits Slam and Solo HR, Red Sox Beat Braves 9-4
headline.main: Pedroia Hits Slam and Solo HR, Red Sox Beat Braves 9-4

snippet: Dustin Pedroia had a grand slam and a solo homer, David Ortiz passed two Hall of Fame Red Sox on the extra-base hits list and Boston beat Atlanta 9-4 on Wednesday night even as the Braves ended their 15-game homerless stretch....
